name: Voronoi Park
description:
A little PICO-8 walking-in-a-park sim using Voronoi diagrams to generate the parks.

This is an example/demo to accompany an article from Issue 4 of Seeds, the Procjam zine which you can read here.  Source code can be downloaded below!

CONTROLS.

MENU SCREEN:

Use up/down/left/right cursor keys to navigate the menu and change the amounts of grass, water and flowers.

Press X to toggle the preview between the original Voronoi diagram and the park generated from it.

Press Z to generate a new park or go for a walk in the current park (when the corresponding option is selected).

IN-GAME:

Up/down/left/right cursor keys to walk around.

Z to toggle the minimap.

X to return to the menu screen.
